text:
Kimberly Hart-Simpson (born 1987) is a British actress from Rhyl, North Wales. She is best known as Nicky Wheatley in the ITV soap opera, "Coronation Street", in 2020, and Chantelle in "Mount Pleasant", in 2016.
Early life.
Hart-Simpson was born in Rhyl, North Wales. She has appeared in "Hollyoaks" twice; two episodes as Davinia, in 2017 and one episode as Beverley, in 2020.
She trained on the BA (Hons) Acting course at Italia Conti and was in the same year as actors Jessica Ellis (best known for playing Tegan Lomax in "Hollyoaks)", Fiona Skinner (DS Abney in "Coronation Street"), and Karla Crome.
